dialogue.htmlContent:
Deciding that you want to take a look inside, you step up to the front doors of 'Angel's Kiss', and, pushing one of them open, you enter the establishment. A little bell rings above your head as you step forwards into the entrance hall, and as you let the door swing shut behind you, you take a look at your surroundings.

A golden chandelier dangles from the high ceiling above you, bathing the entire entrance hall in a soft white light. To your right, a long, mahogany counter runs in parallel to the wall, which, much like the other three that surround you, is half-panelled in dark wood, with the top half being covered in a finely detailed light-blue and white floral wallpaper. Underfoot, a rich burgundy carpet runs down the middle of the hall, with spaces on either side displaying polished oak boards.

There doesn't seem to be anyone in here at the moment, and you wonder just how bad business must be for there not even to be someone assigned to greet customers. With the place appearing to be abandoned, you're on the verge of turning around and making your exit when suddenly someone steps forwards from beyond the archway that links this room to the rest of the building.

Wearing a long, purple plunge dress, the blonde-haired, blue-eyed woman that approaches is nothing short of breath-takingly beautiful. As she steps forwards, her full, red lips turn up into a delightful smile, and she lowers her head a little as she apologises, [angel.speech(I'm so sorry that I kept you waiting, and welcome to my establishment! My name is Angel, and if there's any administrative business you need taken care of, you've come to the right place!)]

[pc.speech(I'm [pc.name],)] you reply, but before you can say anything further, Angel suddenly seems to remember something, and cuts you off.

[angel.speech(Oh! And we're still operating as a brothel too! We might not have as wide of a selection as some of our competitors, but my two girls are among the very best in all of Dominion!)] Angel wrings her hands and glances back the way she came as she continues, [angel.speech(I'm sorry that I'm not able to provide you with the level of comfort that this establishment was once known for, but ever since the Enforcers designated this as the red-light district's administrative centre, I've been buried beneath a pile of paperwork. I really need to get back to it right away, so if you're here to apply for a prostitution license, please follow me back to my office. Oh, and if you're here for Bunny or Loppy, you can find them upstairs.)]

With that, the madam of the establishment rushes off back to her office, leaving you once more all alone in the deserted entrance hall. You could follow Angel to her office, and try to talk to her about the current state of her brothel, or to apply for a prostitution license. You could also head upstairs and try to find the girls Angel referred to as 'Bunny' and 'Loppy'...

Once again, you find yourself standing in the entrance hall of the brothel 'Angel's Kiss'. A golden chandelier dangles from the high ceiling above you, bathing the entire entrance hall in a soft white light. To your right, a long, mahogany counter runs in parallel to the wall, which, much like the other three that surround you, is half-panelled in dark wood, with the top half being covered in a finely detailed light-blue floral wallpaper. Underfoot, a rich burgundy carpet runs down the middle of the hall, with spaces on either side displaying polished oak boards.
There doesn't seem to be anyone in here at the moment, and you wonder just how bad business must be for there not even to be someone assigned to greet customers...
Your slave, [npc.name], is standing behind the front desk, and [npc.she] smiles at you and offers you a greeting.

The corridors of Angel's Kiss bear the same decor as the entrance hall. The walls are half-panelled in dark wood, with the top half being covered in a finely detailed light-blue floral wallpaper. Underfoot, a rich burgundy carpet runs down the middle of the hall, with spaces on either side displaying polished oak boards. The odd painting, cabinet, or doorway breaks up the monotony of your surroundings, which are illuminated by the soft white glow given off from the many light fixtures set into the high ceiling above.

A grand staircase, carpeted in the same rich burgundy as the rest of the establishment, stands before you. From here, you could make your way up to the first floor of the building, or head off into the looping corridor that runs around the ground floor.

A grand staircase, carpeted in the same rich burgundy as the rest of the establishment, stands before you. From here, you could make your way down to the ground floor of the building, or head off into the looping corridor that runs around the first floor.

The many bedrooms in Angel's Kiss are all decorated in much the same way. A clean, king-sized bed sits against one wall, with a pair of bedside cabinets flanking it on either side. An arcane-powered free-standing lamp, giving out a deep red glow, is positioned near the window. The walls are covered in finely detailed floral wallpaper, while underfoot, there's the same burgundy carpet that runs through the rest of the establishment.

A simple wooden door on one side of the room opens out into a small bathroom, allowing the bedroom's occupant to clean themselves after entertaining each of their customers.
This bedroom is currently empty, but despite the lack of any sign of a recent occupant, the room is immaculately clean and free of dust.

This bedroom is currently empty, but despite the lack of any sign of a recent occupant, the room is immaculately clean and free of dust. Although you own a prostitution license, your agreement with Angel was that you'd only be allowed to use the first floor rooms to whore yourself out in. If you were interested in working as a prostitute, you should probably head upstairs...

This bedroom is currently empty, but despite the lack of any sign of a recent occupant, the room is immaculately clean and free of dust. As you own a prostitution license, and have the agreement with Angel that you're allowed to whore yourself out in the first floor rooms, you could wait in here for a client to turn up...

Deciding that you'll sell your body to a client to make some quick cash, you head down to Angel's office to let her know that you're available. After specifying that you'd like to be the submissive partner, you accept Angel's offer of having a new client sent your way, and, returning to your room, you sit down on the bed and wait...

Around twenty-five minutes later, you hear a knock at the door, and you turn to see [npc.a_fullRace] stepping into the room. [npc.speech(Are you [pc.name]? Angel said you're available for two-thousand flames...)]

[pc.speech(Yeah, that's me!)] you happily reply, jumping up from the bed and walking over towards the client. You only have a moment to decide whether you're going to let this [npc.race] pay to fuck you or not...

Deciding that you'll take this client, you step forwards and press yourself against [npc.herHim], sighing, [pc.speech(If you've got the money, I'm all yours...)]

[npc.Name] eagerly hands over the two-thousand flames, and, after taking the money and putting it to one side, you wrap your arms around [npc.herHim]. Leaning in to whisper in [npc.her] ear, you [pc.moan], [pc.speech(Show me how a real [npc.race] fucks...)]

You collapse down onto the bed, breathing heavily as [npc.name] disentangles [npc.herself] from your clutches. Looking down at you, [npc.she] smirks. [npc.speech(That was amazing! You're a great fuck, [pc.name]. Maybe I'll have you again some time.)]

As [npc.she] gathers [npc.her] things and heads towards the exit, you call out, [pc.speech(Come again soon!)]

Deciding that you'll sell your body to a client to make some quick cash, you head down to Angel's office to let her know that you're available. After specifying that you'd like to be the dominant partner, you accept Angel's offer of having a new client sent your way, and, returning to your room, you sit down on the bed and wait...

Around twenty-five minutes later, you hear a knock at the door, and you turn to see [npc.a_fullRace] stepping into the room. [npc.speech(Are you [pc.name]? Angel said you'd dominate me for two-thousand flames...)]

[pc.speech(Yeah, that's me!)] you reply, standing up from the bed and striding towards the client. You only have a moment to decide whether you're going to let this [npc.race] pay to be dominated by you or not...

Deciding that you'll take this client, you step forwards and press yourself against [npc.herHim], reaching around to take a firm grip of [npc.her] [npc.ass+] as you [pc.moan], [pc.speech(If you've got the money, I'll show you how a real dom treats [pc.her] sub...)]

[npc.Name] eagerly hands over the two-thousand flames, and, after taking the money and putting it to one side, you focus your attention on your new client. Leaning in to growl in [npc.her] ear, you [pc.moan], [pc.speech(It's time to show you how I fuck submissive little [npc.races] like you...)]

[npc.Name] collapses down onto the bed, breathing heavily as you disentangle yourself from [npc.her] clutches. Looking down at [npc.herHim], you smirk. [pc.speech(Good bitch, you were a half-decent fuck after all! Maybe I'll let you be my toy again some time.)]

After waiting a moment for [npc.name] to catch [npc.her] breath, you help [npc.herHim] gather [npc.her] things and show [npc.herHim] to the exit. Smiling after [npc.herHim], you call out, [pc.speech(Come again soon!)]

Deciding that you don't want to take this client, you step forwards and apologise, [pc.speech(I'm so sorry, there must have been a mistake. I'm actually coming to the end of my shift now... I'm sure one of the girls down the corridor will love to have some fun with you though!)]

[npc.Name] lets out an annoyed huff, but doesn't press the issue. [npc.speech(Fine... Maybe I'll get to ride you another time...)]

With that, [npc.she] makes [npc.her] exit, leaving you alone in the bedroom once again.

[npc.Name] lets out a disappointed whine, but doesn't press the issue. [npc.speech(Fine... Maybe you'll want to ride me another time...)]

With that, [npc.she] makes [npc.her] exit, leaving you alone in the bedroom once again.

Your slave [npc.name], [npc.a_fullRace], is currently working in this room, and [npc.she] smiles at you as you step through the open door. [npc.speech(Oh, hi, [npc.pcName]! Are you here to have some fun? I don't think there's any need to be charging you, after all...)]

The door to this bedroom is firmly shut and locked, and from within, you can hear the moans of your slave, [npc1.name], as [npc1.she] entertains [npc1.her] client. Checking the ledger that's near the door, you see that [npc1.she]'s currently entertaining [npc2.a_fullRace(true)].

Deciding that you'd like to have some fun with [npc.name], you step forwards and pull [npc.herHim] in against your chest. Leaning in over [npc.her] shoulder, you [pc.moan], [pc.speech(It's time for a good fuck!)]

Deciding that you'd like to have some fun with [npc.name], you step up to [npc.herHim], [pc.moaning], [pc.speech(Come on, [npc.name]! I want you to dominate me!)]

[npc.Name] obediently does as you ask, and, reaching around to grab hold of your [pc.ass+], [npc.she] pulls you into [npc.herHim], growling into your ear, [npc.speech(Sure thing, [npc.pcName]... I'm the one in charge now...)]

The [npc.fullRace], [npc.name], is currently working in this room, and [npc.she] smiles at you as you step through the open door. [npc.speech([pc.Name]! I can never thank you enough for saving me from those alleyways... Angel insists that I charge everyone I sleep with, so I can't offer you a free ride, but I can still give you a huge discount! Instead of the usual two-thousand flames, I'll only charge you three-hundred. That is, if you wanted to have sex with me...)]

The door to this bedroom is firmly shut and locked, and from within, you can hear the moans of [npc1.name] as [npc1.she] entertains [npc1.her] client. Checking the ledger that's near the door, you see that [npc1.she]'s currently entertaining [npc2.a_fullRace(true)].

Deciding that you'd like to have some fun with [npc.name], you hand over the three-hundred flames, before stepping forwards and pulling [npc.herHim] in against your chest. Leaning in over [npc.her] shoulder, you [pc.moan], [pc.speech(It's time for a good fuck!)]

Deciding that you'd like to have some fun with [npc.name], you hand over the three-hundred flames, before stepping up to [npc.herHim] and [pc.moaning], [pc.speech(Come on, [npc.name]! I want you to dominate me!)]

[npc.Name] obediently does as you ask, and, reaching around to grab hold of your [pc.ass+], [npc.she] pulls you into [npc.herHim], growling into your ear, [npc.speech(Sure thing, [npc.pcName]... I'm the one in charge now...)]

[npc.Name] collapses down onto [npc.her] bed, panting heavily. [npc.speech(Ah... [npc.pcName]... that was amazing!)]

You smile down at the exhausted [npc.race], before turning away and gathering your things. As you head towards the door to make your exit, [npc.name] calls out after you, [npc.speech(Please come back again!)]

[npc.Name] collapses down onto [npc.her] bed, letting out a happy sigh, [loppy.speech(Ah... [npc.pcName]... that was great!)]

[npc.She] doesn't sound completely honest, and, seeing as you didn't bring [npc.herHim] to an orgasm, you realise that [npc.she]'s just being professionally courteous. Not being too concerned with this fact, you turn away and start to gather your things. As you head towards the door to make your exit, [npc.name] calls out after you, [npc.speech(Please come back again!)]

Finding yourself at one end of the corridor, you see that the door to the nearest bedroom has been left half-open. Approaching this inviting doorway, you look through to discover that unlike most of the other rooms in Angel's Kiss, this one is actually occupied by a prostitute.

Lying on her stomach on the pink, king-sized bed that's sitting against one wall, this room's occupant is burying her face in the pillows as she kicks her slender legs up and down in frustration. Watching this curious display, you see that the girl has got a round, fluffy rabbit's tail growing out just above her perfectly shaped ass, while up on her head she's got a pair of upright rabbit's ears which are twitching back and forth in time with the kicking of her legs. Suddenly lifting her face up out of the pillows, she groans out loud, [bunny.speech(Bored... bored... bored... BORED!)]

You wonder if you should enter the room and say hello to this rabbit-girl, or turn around and leave...

#IF(bunny.isVisiblyPregnant()) Once again finding yourself standing just outside of Bunny's bedroom, you look through the half-open door to see the rabbit-girl lying back on her bed, staring up at the ceiling and kicking her legs up and down as she waits for her next customer. From your vantage point, you're clearly able to see that the rabbit-girl has a swollen belly, revealing the fact that [style.colourSex(she's pregnant)]. #ELSE Once again finding yourself standing just outside of Bunny's bedroom, you look through the half-open door to see the rabbit-girl once again lying face-down on her bed, kicking her legs up and down as she waits for her next customer. #ENDIF

You wonder if you should enter the room and say hello to Bunny again, or turn around and leave...

Deciding to introduce yourself to this bored rabbit-girl, you push open the door and [pc.step] forwards into her room. Hearing the creak of the floorboards beneath your [pc.feet], the girl turns over on the bed, and after catching sight of you, jumps up onto her hands and knees and excitedly exclaims, [bunny.speech(Eeep! Are you a customer?! A real-life, actual customer?!)]

The rabbit-girl's voice, full of shock at first, quickly shifts to an excited tone, and, not giving you a moment to respond, she suddenly leaps to her feet and bounces towards you. [bunny.speech(Hi, hi, hi! Oh my goodness, a customer! Oh, I'm being super rude aren't I? I'm Bunny! So nice to meet you!)]

[pc.speech(Hi, Bunny, I'm [pc.name],)] you reply.

The rabbit-girl grabs your [pc.hand] and gives it an enthusiastic shake as she continues, [bunny.speech(So I guess Angel told you to come up here? I'm so sorry that she didn't show you up here in person, she's been super busy with stuff for a while now... But anyway! Enough of that! You wanna have sex, right? It's been aaages since my older sis' Loppy and I got any customers here, so I'm sooo horny right now.)]

[pc.speech(You work here with your sister?)] you ask.

[bunny.speech(Yeah, she's down the other end of the corridor. We used to share a room, back when this place was the busiest brothel in all Dominion, but ever since those Enforcers made Angel run this place as an admin centre, people started to stop coming here. Better not to get involved with anything the Enforcers have a hand in, right?)] Bunny suddenly realises what she's saying, and splutters, [bunny.speech(W-Wait, there's nothing wrong with this place, it's just people are kind of wary, y'know? Anyway, I started talking about boring stuff again... So yeah, Loppy's my older sister, and, getting down to business, it's gonna be one-thousand five-hundred flames to have some fun with either of us. Angel sets the prices, so there's no haggling, ok?)]

You start to respond, but Bunny suddenly lets out an excited little cry, and, jumping up and down on the spot, she happily exclaims, [bunny.speech(Oh! Oh! You look like you're kinda rich, y'know? I don't make this offer to just anyone, but if you want to take Loppy and I at the same time, then for five-thousand flames I can go and fetch her here right now! Oh, and I should warn you, she's a futa, so if you're not into cocks, maybe you'd best just stick with me.)]

You wonder if you should take Bunny up on her offer, or decline and perhaps come back later...

#IF(bunny.isVisiblyPregnant())

[pc.Stepping] into the rabbit-girl's bedroom and announcing your presence with a quick hello, you watch as Bunny's large, rabbit-like ears twitch in response to your greeting, before she laboriously sits up and looks over at the door. Seeing that it's you, she points down at her swollen belly and excitedly calls out, #IF(!bunny.isCharacterReactedToPregnancy(pc)) [bunny.speech([pc.Name]! Look! Even though I was on the pill, you still managed to get me pregnant! Your seed must be super virile or something; I can't believe you actually managed to get me knocked up! Come and have a feel of my tummy!)] #ELSE [bunny.speech([pc.Name]! Look! I'm still pregnant with our kids! Come and have a feel of my tummy!)] #ENDIF

Doing as the mother of your children asks, you [pc.step] over to where she's still sitting on the edge of her bed and reach down to give her swollen belly a loving rub. Thanks to the fact that she's wearing a miniskirt and cami top in place of her usual tight-fitting bodysuit, you're able to run your hands over Bunny's exposed skin, making her let out a happy little giggle and seductively moan, [bunny.speech(You'd like to fuck a pregnant bunny, wouldn't you, [pc.name]? Come on, just hand over your flames and we can do a recreation of how our kids were conceived...)]

Biting her lip and batting her eyelids at you, the horny bunny lets out another little giggle as she awaits your answer. You could pay her for sex, or make an excuse and take your leave...

#ELSE

[pc.Stepping] into the rabbit-girl's bedroom and announcing your presence with a quick hello, you watch as Bunny's large, rabbit-like ears twitch in response to your greeting, before she quickly spins over onto her back and jumps up onto her feet. Seeing that it's you, she calls out in excitement, [bunny.speech([pc.Name]! Hi! How're you doing? You here to come get a piece of this bunny's hot ass?! Or maybe you've got the flames to have a go with my sis' and I at the same time?!)]

Bunny giggles as she bounds forwards, bouncing up and down on the spot as she awaits your answer. You could pay her for sex, or make an excuse and take your leave...

#ENDIF

You hand over one-thousand five-hundred flames to Bunny, who squeals in excitement as she sees that you're here for sex, [bunny.speech(Ooh! Yes! Finally, this bunny gets to have some fun!)]

Setting the money to one side, Bunny bounces forwards, wrapping her arms around your back and leaning in as she whispers, [bunny.speech(So, come on then, let's fuck like rabbits!)]

[pc.speech(How about you run and fetch your sister,)] you say, handing over five-thousand flames.

Bunny's eyes go wide as she takes the money, and, placing it to one side, she lets out a delighted squeal, [bunny.speech(Oh! This is gonna be so much fun! Wait right here! I'll go get Loppy!)]

With that, the excited rabbit-girl sprints out of the room to fetch her elder sister.

You're not kept waiting for long, and after less than two minutes, Bunny bounds back into the room. Following in her footsteps, and looking every bit as excited as her sister, is Loppy.

You can instantly tell that they're related, as they have very similar facial features. Loppy's hair and fur is a slighter darker shade of brown than her sister's, and her eyes are brown whereas Bunny's are green, but apart from that, and the fact that her rabbit-like ears are floppy instead of upright, the two sisters are almost identical to one another. As you're marvelling at how alike they look, Loppy grins at you and exclaims, [loppy.speech(Hey there, [pc.name]! Bunny's told me all about your naughty plan... Fucking us both at the same time? This is going to be good!)]

Obviously the more dominant of the pair, Loppy turns towards her sister, and, grabbing both sides of her head, she pulls her into a passionate kiss. Dragging Bunny with her, she then steps over towards her sister's bed, and, reaching down to grab her ass, drags her down onto the mattress. Pushing herself up onto all fours, she tells Bunny to do the same, and within the span of just a few seconds, you're looking down at the rabbit-morph sisters as they present themselves to you...

You're not kept waiting for long, and after less than two minutes, Bunny bounds back into the room. Following in her footsteps, and looking every bit as excited as her sister, is Loppy. #IF(loppy.isVisiblyPregnant()) #IF(!loppy.isCharacterReactedToPregnancy(pc)) As she sees that it's you, Loppy grins and points down to her clearly-swollen belly, before exclaiming, [loppy.speech(Hey there, [pc.name]! Look at what you went and did; you got me knocked up! Anyway, Bunny's told me all about your naughty plan... Fucking us both at the same time? Let's show my sis' how our kids were conceived!)] #ELSE As she sees that it's you, Loppy grins and points down to her swollen belly, before exclaiming, [loppy.speech([pc.Name], look, I'm still pregnant! Anyway, Bunny's told me all about your naughty plan... Fucking us both at the same time? Let's show my sis' how our kids were conceived!)] #ENDIF #ELSE As she sees that it's you, Loppy grins and exclaims, [loppy.speech(Hey there, [pc.name]! Bunny's told me all about your naughty plan... Fucking us both at the same time? This is going to be good!)] #ENDIF

Obviously the more dominant of the pair, Loppy turns towards her sister, and, grabbing both sides of her head, pulls her into a passionate kiss. Dragging Bunny with her, she then steps over towards her sister's bed, and by reaching down to grab her ass, drags her down onto the mattress. Pushing herself up onto all fours, she tells Bunny to do the same, and within the span of just a few seconds, you're looking down at the rabbit-morph sisters as they present themselves to you...

[pc.speech(Sorry, Bunny, I don't have time right now, but I might be back later,)] you explain, before heading towards the door.

[bunny.speech(Awww...)] Bunny pouts, [bunny.speech(Make sure to come back soon! I can show you a real good time!)]

Bunny collapses down onto her bed, panting heavily. [bunny.speech(Ah... [pc.name]... that was amazing!)]

You smile down at the exhausted rabbit-morph, before turning away and gathering your things. As you head towards the door to make your exit, Bunny calls out after you, [bunny.speech(Please come back again!)]

Bunny collapses down onto her bed, letting out a happy little sigh, [bunny.speech(Ah... [pc.name]... that was great!)]

She doesn't sound completely honest, and, seeing as you didn't bring Bunny to an orgasm, you realise that she's just being professionally courteous. Not being too concerned with this fact, you turn away and start to gather your things. As you head towards the door to make your exit, Bunny calls out after you, [bunny.speech(Please come back again!)]

The two sisters collapse down onto the bed in front of you, panting and sighing with exhaustion. As they realise that you've finished with them, Loppy is the first to make a move, and, turning over to lie on her back, she props herself up on her elbows and calls out, [loppy.speech([pc.Name], that was amazing! My sis' and I haven't had this much fun in forever!)]

Following her sister's lead, Bunny pushes herself up onto her knees, and, turning towards you, giggles, [bunny.speech(Loppy's right, that was really fantastic! You'll come back again soon, right?)]

Smiling down at the rabbit-girl sisters before you, you reply, [pc.speech(We'll have to see, won't we?)]

The girls each let out a playful giggle, before Loppy stands up and gathers her things. [loppy.speech(Well, I'd better get back to my room. I hope we get to have some more fun together some time soon [pc.name]! See ya Bunny!)]

With that, Loppy makes her exit, and, following her lead, you gather your own things and head towards the door. Just before you make your exit, Bunny calls out after you, [bunny.speech(Please do come back again!)]

The bedroom at this end of the corridor has its door left wide open, and as you approach to take a look inside, you see that it's occupied by a solitary prostitute. Gazing out of the window on the far side of the room, a floppy-eared, cotton-tailed rabbit-girl has her back is turned towards you. Her floppy rabbit-ears occasionally twitch back and forth, and as you watch, she lets out a wistful sigh and groans, [loppy.speech(I'm so bored...)]

You could enter her room and call out a greeting, or instead turn around and return the way you came...

#IF(loppy.isVisiblyPregnant()) Once again finding yourself standing before the wide-open door to Loppy's bedroom, you look inside to see the rabbit-girl standing on the far side of the room gazing out of the window. Even from this position, you can see that her belly is visibly swollen, revealing the fact that [style.colourSex(she's pregnant)]. #ELSE Once again finding yourself standing before the wide-open door to Loppy's bedroom, you look inside to see the rabbit-girl standing on the far side of the room gazing out of the window. Her floppy rabbit-ears occasionally twitch back and forth, and as you watch, she lets out a wistful sigh and groans, [loppy.speech(I'm so bored...)] #ENDIF

You wonder if you should enter the room and say hello to Loppy again, or turn around and leave...

Deciding that you want to say hello to this rabbit-girl, you [pc.step] forwards and enter her room. Before you're able to call out a greeting, the prostitute's floppy rabbit-ears suddenly twitch, and she spins to face you and ask, [loppy.speech(Who are you? Angel said the cleaners wouldn't be here until for another three hours... Wait... You're not a customer are you?)]

The rabbit-girl's cheeks start to turn red as she realises her mistake, and, rushing forwards, she frantically apologises, [loppy.speech(Oh no! I'm so, so sorry! I didn't mean any offence, it's just that we haven't had any real customers for so long! I'm Loppy, at your service!)]

The rabbit-girl hastily bows her head, causing her floppy ears to swing back and forth in a rather comical manner. Smiling down at Loppy you reply, [pc.speech(Hi, Loppy, I'm [pc.name].)]

[loppy.speech(Pleased to meet you, [pc.name]! Oh, my sis' is never going to believe this... an actual customer!)] Loppy bounces up and down in her excitement. [loppy.speech(Oh, my younger sis' is Bunny by the way, and she works here too! She's just down the other end of this corridor. We actually used to share a room, but ever since Angel got mixed up in Enforcer business, all the customers stopped coming, and all of the other girls moved out to the other brothels...)]

Suddenly realising that she's not doing the best job of advertising her services, Loppy quickly changes the subject, [loppy.speech(Anyway! Enough of that! If you're looking for a good time, you definitely came to the right place! Oh, and I'd better warn you right now, I've got a nice tight pussy for you to fuck, but I'm also packing a little extra equipment downstairs...)]

Loppy giggles, and, running her hands down between her legs, she pushes her hips forwards a little. Looking down, you see that she's got a considerable bulge pressing out against the fabric of her bodysuit, and as she sees that you've noticed her 'extra equipment', Loppy giggles, [loppy.speech(I can also get a little more dominant than my sis, so if that takes your fancy, then it'll be two-thousand five-hundred flames for a session where I'm the one in charge. I'm warning you though, I can get a little rough like that... If not, I can be a good little sub and let you fuck my brains out for two-thousand flames. Oh, oh! And if you fancied taking both my sister and I at once, then for five-thousand flames we can do that too! So, what'll it be?)]

Loppy bites her lip and flutters her eyelids at you, waiting for your answer...

#IF(loppy.isVisiblyPregnant())

The door to Angel's office is wide open, and a little sign outside her door reads: 'For all Administrative Enquiries, please knock and enter!'

Following the sign's instructions, you knock the open door as you step inside. The room that you find yourself walking into is stacked high with mountains of ledgers and piles of papers. A snaking path has been left to link the doorway with a desk on the far side of the room, and it's behind this that you spot Angel busily signing and stamping her way through a stack of official-looking forms. As she hears you knock, she looks up and smiles. [angel.speech(Ah, [pc.name]! Please do come in!)]

Carefully weaving your way past precariously balanced towers of paperwork, you quickly find yourself standing before Angel's desk. [pc.speech(Hi, Angel,)] you say, [pc.speech(so I'm guessing that this is the place where all the admin work is done.)]

Angel puts her pen down and leans back in her chair. [angel.speech(Yeah... It used to all be handled at the Enforcer HQ, until one of the bright sparks over there decided that it would easier to offload all of this work on the largest and most popular brothel in Dominion. Well, at least that's what this place used to be. Once everyone saw that I was working for the Enforcers, they all stopped visiting. Better not to get mixed up in anything that they're associated with, right?)]

[pc.speech(I'm guessing you couldn't just say no to them,)] you observe.

Angel lets out a little laugh, [angel.speech(Hah, believe me, I tried! I told the first Enforcer that visited where to shove it, but the very next day, about twenty of them barged their way in and told me that I'd be doing it, or I'd be for sale in Slaver Alley within the hour. Typical Enforcers...)] Angel lets out a little sigh, before shaking her head and smiling up at you. [angel.speech(But anyway, enough of my woes! If it's a prostitution license you're after, then I can set you up with one of those right now. It's a five-thousand flame fee, and then you'll be able to legally charge people for having sex with you. You can also buy an enhanced license for twenty-thousand flames, which will allow you to assign any slaves that you might own as prostitutes.)]

For the past few weeks, I've had my two girls, Bunny and Loppy, walking around through the red-light district, informing people that the Enforcers aren't interested in policing this establishment in any way. From what they've reported back to me, they've convinced all of our old customers to start visiting us again. The problem is, however, that all of the prostitutes that used to work for me have left, and, what with all this paperwork, I don't have time to find any new ones.)]

[pc.speech(So you want me to find prostitutes to come and work here?)] you say, surmising what Angel was leading up to.

[angel.speech(Exactly! From what I hear, there are plenty of unregistered prostitutes illegally working out of the alleyways. All you'd need to do is convince them to pay me a visit, and I'll get them started working for me!)]

I'll take all of the proceeds from the alleyway prostitutes you send to me, and just fifteen percent of the proceeds from what your slaves earn.
